verses.text: And \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* out of \w Shittim|strong="H7851"\w* \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* to \w spy|strong="H7270"\w* \w secretly|strong="H2791"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w* \w view|strong="H7200"\w* the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, even \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*. And they \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* into an \w harlot’s|strong="H2181"\w* \w house|strong="H0802"\w*, \w named|strong="H8034"\w* \w Rahab|strong="H7343"\w*, and \w lodged|strong="H7901"\w* there.\f + \fr 2.1 \ft sent: or, had sent\f*\f + \fr 2.1 \ft lodged: Heb. lay\f*

And it was \w told|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Behold, there \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* in hither to \w night|strong="H3915"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* to search \w out|strong="H2658"\w* the \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.

And the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Jericho|strong="H3405"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* unto \w Rahab|strong="H7343"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Bring \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* that are \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to thee, which are \w entered|strong="H0935"\w* into thine \w house|strong="H1004"\w*: for they be \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to search \w out|strong="H2658"\w* all the \w country|strong="H0776"\w*.

And the \w woman|strong="H0802"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, and \w hid|strong="H6845"\w* them, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* thus, There \w came|strong="H0935"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* unto me, but I \w wist|strong="H3045"\w* not \w whence|strong="H0370"\w* they \add were:\add*

And it came to pass \add about the time\add* of \w shutting|strong="H5462"\w* of the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, when it was \w dark|strong="H2822"\w*, that the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*: whither the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w went|strong="H1980"\w* I \w wot|strong="H3045"\w* not: \w pursue|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them \w quickly|strong="H4118"\w*; for ye shall \w overtake|strong="H5381"\w* them.

But she had brought them \w up|strong="H5927"\w* to the \w roof|strong="H1406"\w* of the house, and \w hid|strong="H2934"\w* them with the \w stalks|strong="H6086"\w* of \w flax|strong="H6593"\w*, which she had laid in \w order|strong="H6186"\w* upon the \w roof|strong="H1406"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* to \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w* unto the \w fords|strong="H4569"\w*: and as soon as they which \w pursued|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* them were gone \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, they \w shut|strong="H5462"\w* the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*.
¶ And before they were laid \w down|strong="H7901"\w*, she came \w up|strong="H5927"\w* unto them upon the \w roof|strong="H1406"\w*;

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto the \w men|strong="H0582"\w*, I \w know|strong="H3045"\w* that the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* you the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, and that your \w terror|strong="H0367"\w* is \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w* upon us, and that all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w faint|strong="H4127"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of you.\f + \fr 2.9 \ft faint: Heb. melt\f*

For we have \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* how the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* dried \w up|strong="H3001"\w* the \w water|strong="H4325"\w* of the \w Red|strong="H5488"\w* \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* for \w you|strong="H6440"\w*, when ye came \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*; and what ye \w did|strong="H6213"\w* unto the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w kings|strong="H4428"\w* of the \w Amorites|strong="H0567"\w*, that \add were\add* on the other \w side|strong="H5676"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w Sihon|strong="H5511"\w* and \w Og|strong="H5747"\w*, whom ye utterly \w destroyed|strong="H2763"\w*.

And as soon as we had \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add these things\add*, our \w hearts|strong="H3824"\w* did \w melt|strong="H4549"\w*, neither did there \w remain|strong="H6965"\w* any more \w courage|strong="H7307"\w* in any \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of you: for the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* your \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, he \add is\add* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* in \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w above|strong="H4605"\w*, and in \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* beneath.\f + \fr 2.11 \ft did there…: Heb. rose up\f*

Now therefore, I pray you, \w swear|strong="H7650"\w* unto me by the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, \w since|strong="H3588"\w* I have \w shewed|strong="H6213"\w* you \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w*, that ye will also \w shew|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindness|strong="H2617"\w* unto my \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, and \w give|strong="H5414"\w* me a \w true|strong="H0571"\w* \w token|strong="H0226"\w*:

And \add that\add* ye will save \w alive|strong="H2421"\w* my \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and my \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, and my \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and my \w sisters|strong="H0269"\w*, and all that they have, and \w deliver|strong="H5337"\w* our \w lives|strong="H5315"\w* from \w death|strong="H4194"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w* her, Our \w life|strong="H5315"\w* for \w yours|strong="H4191"\w*, if ye \w utter|strong="H5046"\w* not this our \w business|strong="H1697"\w*. And it shall be, when the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w given|strong="H5414"\w* us the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, that we will \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* \w kindly|strong="H2617"\w* and \w truly|strong="H0571"\w* with thee.\f + \fr 2.14 \ft for…: Heb. instead of you to die\f*

Then she let them \w down|strong="H3381"\w* by a \w cord|strong="H2256"\w* \w through|strong="H1157"\w* the \w window|strong="H2474"\w*: for her \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \add was\add* upon the \w town|strong="H7023"\w* \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*, and she \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* upon the \w wall|strong="H2346"\w*.

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, \w Get|strong="H3212"\w* you to the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, lest the \w pursuers|strong="H7291"\w* \w meet|strong="H6293"\w* you; and \w hide|strong="H2247"\w* yourselves there \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, until the \w pursuers|strong="H7291"\w* be \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*: and \w afterward|strong="H0310"\w* may ye \w go|strong="H3212"\w* your \w way|strong="H1870"\w*.

And the \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto her, We \add will be\add* \w blameless|strong="H5355"\w* of this thine \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* which thou hast made us \w swear|strong="H7650"\w*.

Behold, \add when\add* we \w come|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*, thou shalt \w bind|strong="H7194"\w* this \w line|strong="H8615"\w* of \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w thread|strong="H2339"\w* in the \w window|strong="H2474"\w* which thou didst let us down \w by|strong="H3381"\w*: and thou shalt \w bring|strong="H0622"\w* thy \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, and thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w*, and thy \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and all thy \w father’s|strong="H0001"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, \w home|strong="H1004"\w* unto thee.\f + \fr 2.18 \ft bring: Heb. gather\f*

And it shall be, \add that\add* \w whosoever|strong="H0834"\w* shall go \w out|strong="H3318"\w* of the \w doors|strong="H1817"\w* of thy \w house|strong="H1004"\w* into the \w street|strong="H2351"\w*, his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add shall be\add* upon his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and we \add will be\add* \w guiltless|strong="H5355"\w*: and whosoever shall be with thee in the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, his \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* \add shall be\add* on our \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, if \add any\add* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* be upon him.

And if thou \w utter|strong="H5046"\w* this our \w business|strong="H1697"\w*, then we will be \w quit|strong="H5355"\w* of thine \w oath|strong="H7621"\w* which thou hast made us to \w swear|strong="H7650"\w*.

And she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, According unto your \w words|strong="H1697"\w*, so \add be\add* it. And she sent them \w away|strong="H7971"\w*, and they \w departed|strong="H3212"\w*: and she \w bound|strong="H7194"\w* the \w scarlet|strong="H8144"\w* \w line|strong="H8615"\w* in the \w window|strong="H2474"\w*.

And they \w went|strong="H3212"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* unto the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, and \w abode|strong="H3427"\w* there \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w days|strong="H3117"\w*, until the \w pursuers|strong="H7291"\w* were \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*: and the \w pursuers|strong="H7291"\w* \w sought|strong="H1245"\w* \add them\add* throughout all the \w way|strong="H1870"\w*, but \w found|strong="H4672"\w* \add them\add* not.

¶ So the \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \w men|strong="H0582"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w descended|strong="H3381"\w* from the \w mountain|strong="H2022"\w*, and passed \w over|strong="H5674"\w*, and \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nun|strong="H5126"\w*, and \w told|strong="H5608"\w* him all \add things\add* that \w befell|strong="H4672"\w* them:

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Joshua|strong="H3091"\w*, \w Truly|strong="H3588"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* hath \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* into our \w hands|strong="H3027"\w* all the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; for even all the \w inhabitants|strong="H3427"\w* of the \w country|strong="H0776"\w* do \w faint|strong="H4127"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of us.\f + \fr 2.24 \ft faint: Heb. melt\f*
